article: There is  _  old man in New York. He  doesn't like  children at all.  _  he likes cats very much. He has black cats and white cats. He has  mother  cats and baby cats. So children  like to  come to his house . They come to play  _  the cats. More and more cats conic to the old man's house. Soon there are too many  _  . The old man can't give them much food. So he has an idea . "The children  _  my cats." he thinks. So he gives each child  a cat  . Then he is happy. The children are happy ,  _  the cats are happy, too. Because they each have a home .
